subject: Lead Quality Feedback - Q3 Marketing Campaigns
body:
Hi Alex,

I wanted to provide some feedback on the leads generated from the recent Q3 marketing campaigns. Overall, we're seeing great improvement!

Positive trends:
- Lead quality score increased by 22%
- Conversion rate from MQL to SQL up 18%
- Average deal size 12% higher than Q2

Areas for improvement:
- Tech industry leads need better qualification
- Geographic targeting could be refined for West Coast

Could we schedule a 30-minute meeting next week to discuss optimizing the lead scoring criteria? I think we can push conversion rates even higher.

Thanks for the great collaboration!

Carlos
Senior Sales Manager
